tool_description: jsonstore offers a free and secured JSON-based cloud datastore for small projects
name: jsonstore.io
title: jsonstore.io

api_list.name: Generate new API token
api_list.description: You'll be using this token for storing, modifying, retrieving and deleting data from your own bucket
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bluzi-jsonstore-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com/get-token"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bluzi-jsonstore-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bluzi-jsonstore-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com/get-token"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bluzi-jsonstore-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
